greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of the natural numbers (0,1,2,3,...): Odious numbers (A000069) interleaved with Evil numbers (A001969).
comment: This is the lodumo_2 of the Thue-Morse sequence A010059, where lodumo_k of sequences is defined in A159970. [_Philippe Deléham_, Apr 29 2009]
formula: Antidiagonals of an array, Odious numbers (A000069) in row 1 and Evil numbers (A001969) in row 2: 1, 2, 4, 7, 8, 11, 13,... 0, 3, 5, 6, 9, 10, 12,...
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 24 2008
